item.title: How to Render Jupyter Notebooks in Hugo with a Custom Shortcode
item.description: Jupyter notebooks are a fantastic tool for data scientists and programmers, allowing you to write code, visualize results, and write documentation all in one place. Hugo is a powerful and flexible static site generator that’s great for blogging and building websites. But what if you want to share your Jupyter notebooks on your Hugo website? This step-by-step guide will walk you through how to render Jupyter notebooks in Hugo using a custom shortcode and automate the process using GitHub Actions.
